mapper.select: SELECT check_system_first_level AS firstId, check_system_second_level AS secondId, risk_level AS riskLevel, submit_time AS submitTime FROM check_summary WHERE project_id = #{projectId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO check_summary(project_id, check_system_first_level, check_system_second_level, risk_level) VALUE (#{projectId}, #{firstId}, #{secondId}, #{riskLevel})
